meanings.definition: A person who engages in wasteful or unnecessary work.
meanings.sent1: The boondogglers in the office spent hours rearranging papers for no reason.
meanings.sent2: The team of boondogglers was tasked with counting the number of clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The boondogglers decided to have a competition on who could stare at a wall the longest.
meanings.sent4: The boondogglers were like busy bees buzzing around without a hive.
meanings.sent5: The image of the boondogglers idly shuffling papers stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who are involved in a pointless or unproductive activity.
meanings.sent1: During the team-building exercise, we were split into boondogglers who had to untie knots blindfolded.
meanings.sent2: The boondogglers gathered in the park to watch paint dry as part of their experiment.
meanings.sent3: The boondogglers formed a club dedicated to watching grass grow.
meanings.sent4: The boondogglers resembled a flock of birds flying in circles with no destination.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the boondogglers wasting time together lingered in my thoughts.
